pr_title: KOGITO-3452: uniform error handling of build/encode/decode in CloudEventUtils

timeline.message: KOGITO-3452: Uniform error handling of build/encode/decode in CloudEventUtils

timeline.bodyText: Is it ok to only log an error without throwing any exception or inform user also some other way?
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

replies.bodyText:
This PR is an integration of KOGITO-3297.
Yes I think this approach is correct because here in case of error we're simply not sending a trace event that the user should not be aware of. We discussed this approach with Optional here.
replies.author: kostola
